clause_text: These Unified Development Control and Promotion Regulations are published by the State Government under Section 20(3) of the Maharashtra Regional &Town Planning Act, 1966 vide Notice No.TPS-1818/ C.R.236/18/ Sec.20(3)/UD-13, Dated 02nd December, 2020.
